title: Eiger Adventure
overview:
Eiger Adventure is a premier mobile application designed to enhance the outdoor experience by providing a seamless shopping platform for adventure enthusiasts. The app offers a wide range of high-quality outdoor gear, including apparel and equipment tailored for activities such as camping, hiking, traveling, and riding.

With a user-friendly interface, Eiger Adventure enables customers to explore products effortlessly, shop based on their preferred activities, and stay connected with official Eiger stores. The app also provides exclusive benefits for members of the Eiger Adventure Club, including special promotions and free shipping across Indonesia.

By integrating modern e-commerce features with a passion for outdoor adventure, Eiger Adventure ensures that every journey is well-equipped and more enjoyable.
key_features: Intuitive and user-friendly shopping experience
Personalized product recommendations using AI
User engagement tracking with AppsFlyer and Mixpanel
Deeplinking for seamless navigation from various platforms
Eiger Adventure Club membership perks (discounts & free shipping)
Store locator with Google Maps integration
Secure payments and order tracking
Real-time updates on term and condition
Low bandwidth usage
Easy user authentication using Google and Apple Sign-In
Custom Camera
challenges_solutions: Performance Optimization: Reduced frame drops by implementing lazy loading for product images and optimizing API calls.
AI-Powered Recommendations: Integrated Insider models to enhance product recommendations based on user behavior.
Scalability and Maintainability: Used clean architecture and best practices to ensure the app is scalable and maintainable.
User Engagement: Integrated AppsFlyer and Mixpanel to track user behavior and improve marketing strategies.
User Authentication: Implemented Google Sign-In and Apple Sign-In for a seamless and secure login experience.
Real-Time Updates: Utilized Firebase Realtime Database to provide instant updates on term and condition.
my_role: Led the mobile development using Flutter, ensuring a smooth UI/UX experience.
Integrated AI-based product recommendations.
Collaborated with backend engineers to optimize API performance.
Ensured clean and maintainable code using best practices.
Maintained a crash rate below 1% through rigorous testing and monitoring.
Reduced app size by 30% through code optimization and asset compression.
Reduce bandwidth usage by 20% by implementing image caching and prefetching.

impact_metrics.text: 100,000+ downloads on Google Play Store And App Store
4.8-star rating based on 5,000+ reviews
Ranked Top 25 in the Shopping category
Maintenanced a crash rate below 1%

future_plans: Implement an augmented reality (AR) feature for virtual product try-ons
Improve AI recommendations using user engagement data
Expand the loyalty program with gamification features
description: With the remarkable success of the Eiger Adventure project, Eiger Indonesia has strengthened its partnership with RollingGlory, collaborating on various events and expanding its initiatives. This strategic collaboration has led to the development of new projects aimed at enhancing the outdoor experience, delivering innovative solutions, and reaching a broader audience. Through this partnership, both companies continue to push boundaries, ensuring that adventure enthusiasts receive high-quality products and services tailored to their needs. $!Building on this strong collaboration, Eiger Indonesia continues to trust RollingGlory as a key development partner, awarding five new projects to further elevate its digital and retail experiences. These projects aim to enhance user engagement, streamline operations, and introduce innovative features that align with Eiger's commitment to adventure and exploration. With this continued partnership, both companies are set to create cutting-edge solutions that redefine the outdoor industry and deliver exceptional value to their customers.$!One of these exciting new projects is Eiger Adventure Land, a groundbreaking initiative designed to bring the spirit of adventure to life. This project aims to create an immersive experience that blends technology with outdoor exploration, offering adventure enthusiasts a unique way to engage with the Eiger brand. Through this collaboration, RollingGlory is leveraging its expertise to develop innovative digital solutions that enhance user interaction, making Eiger Adventure Land a key milestone in Eiger Indonesia’s journey to inspire and connect with its community.$!
captions: Eiger Indonesia And Rolling Glory Collaboration
Jason Wuysang (Eiger's Marketing General Manager) and Brian Al Bahr (Rolling Glory's CEO) at Eiger Pasific Media Conference 2024

title: KaderKita
overview: KaderKita is a mobile app developed in collaboration between PATH, Somia, and RGB, funded by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, to enhance healthcare access in rural areas through innovative digital solutions. It enables community health workers to record and manage health data, even without an internet connection. With offline capabilities, KaderKita ensures that data can be stored and synchronized once connectivity is available, making it a reliable tool for improving public health in remote locations.

Database: IsarDB (Used for mobile offline data storage)

key_features: Offline Data Collection
Seamless Data Synchronization
Simple and intuitive design for community health workers
Comprehensive Health Records
Geotagging & Mapping
Customizable Health Forms
Connects with existing healthcare databases for seamless data sharing
challenges_solutions: Limited Internet Access: Enabled offline data collection and automatic synchronization when connectivity is available.
Data Accuracy & Consistency: Implemented predefined health forms and real-time validation checks to reduce errors.
Low Digital Literacy Among Health Workers: Designed a user-friendly interface and provided training support for seamless adoption.
Device & Battery Limitations: Optimized the app for low-power usage and ensured compatibility with lightweight devices.
Data Security & Privacy Concerns: Enforced encrypted storage and secure access controls to protect sensitive health data
my_role: Led the mobile development using Flutter, ensuring an intuitive and efficient UI/UX for health workers.
Developed offline data collection and syncing mechanisms for seamless usability in low-connectivity areas.
Integrated secure data encryption and access controls to protect sensitive health information.
Optimized the app for low-power devices, improving performance and battery efficiency.
Collaborated with backend engineers to ensure smooth API integration and data synchronization with health systems.
Maintained clean, scalable, and well-documented code following Flutter best practices.

impact_metrics.text: 80% reduction in paper-based data collection, improving efficiency.
Significant time savings for health workers in recording and accessing patient data.
Positive user feedback

future_plans: Enhance offline capabilities to support more complex health data collection.
Integrate real-time data analytics for better decision-making by health workers.
Develop multilingual support to improve accessibility for diverse communities.
description:
In a remote village deep in Papua, where internet access is scarce and paper-based records slow down healthcare services, a team of dedicated health workers gathered to test a new solution (KaderKita). Designed to revolutionize health data collection in rural areas, the app provided offline capabilities, allowing healthcare workers to record, store, and later sync patient data without needing a constant internet connection.

As the pilot program rolled out, community health workers embraced the app with enthusiasm. For years, they had relied on handwritten notes, often leading to lost records and delayed treatments. Now, with KaderKita, they could quickly log medical histories, update treatments, and tag locations—all from their mobile devices. $! 
With the success of the pilot in Papua, the project team is now refining KaderKita based on real-world feedback. Future updates will include real-time analytics, multilingual support, and expanded interoperability with national health systems, ensuring more communities benefit from this innovation.

The journey has just begun, but one thing is clear—KaderKita is bridging the gap in rural healthcare, one digital record at a time.
captions: Health Workers in Papua Using KaderKita

title: Exploria Host
overview: Exploria Host is a platform designed for passionate local tour guides and event organizers. With Exploria Host, you can register as a local guide, mark new locations, and create unique local events to showcase the beauty of your region.
key_features: Add hidden gems, cultural landmarks, and must-visit spots to enrich the travel experience.
Create and manage local events to engage with travelers
Interact with an active community through reviews and insights
Use interactive maps for easy location marking and navigation
challenges_solutions: Google Maps Integration: Successfully implemented custom markers and optimized performance for smooth navigation.
Geocoding & Location Data: Integrated geocoding services to accurately convert addresses into coordinates and improve location-based search.
Event Management System: Built a user-friendly interface for guides to create, manage, and promote local events effortlessly.
my_role: Led the project as the Project Manager, overseeing development, strategy, and execution.
Developed the mobile application using Flutter, ensuring a seamless UI/UX experience.
Coordinated with designers and engineers to align features with user needs and business goals.
Ensured clean, scalable, and maintainable code for both frontend and backend systems.

impact_metrics.text: 1st Place for Best App at my campus competition
Awarded an A for outstanding project execution

overview: Jelajahin is your ultimate guide to discovering local attractions and hidden gems. Whether you're looking for scenic spots, cultural experiences, or off-the-beaten-path adventures, Jelajahin helps you explore unique places near you with ease.
key_features: Discover hidden gems and local attractions effortlessly
Explore places with interactive maps and real-time navigation
Save favorite locations and create custom travel lists
Stay updated with reviews, ratings, and community insights

title: Imma
overview: IMMA (Integrated Material Monitoring Application) is a specialized platform developed for PT PJB to streamline warehouse material tracking. It ensures efficient monitoring of materials entering and leaving the warehouse, providing real-time updates for better inventory control.
key_features: Quickly scan materials for instant tracking and authentication.
Maintain accurate stock levels and movement history.
Generate comprehensive reports to enhance decision-making.
Prevent discrepancies with a tamper-proof record system.
challenges_solutions: QR Code Scanning Efficiency: Optimized QR scanning performance to ensure fast and accurate material tracking.
Real-Time Data Synchronization: Implemented efficient API handling and caching strategies to maintain real-time updates.
Scalability: Designed a robust Laravel backend to handle increasing data volume and warehouse expansions.
my_role: Led the mobile development using Kotlin and Laravel, ensuring a smooth UI/UX experience.
Integrated QR code scanning for efficient warehouse material tracking.
Managed and guided a team of backend and mobile developers to streamline project execution.
Collaborated with backend developers to optimize API performance and scalability.

impact_metrics.text: Successfully streamlined warehouse operations, reducing material tracking time by 40%.
Improved inventory accuracy by 35%, minimizing discrepancies in stock records.

title: Peduly
overview: Peduly is a digital platform that simplifies fundraising, donations, and volunteer opportunities in one place. With Peduly, individuals and organizations can support social causes, contribute to fundraising campaigns, and find volunteer opportunities to make a real impact.
key_features: Seamless fundraising and donation process with an intuitive interface
Create and manage fundraising campaigns for various social causes
Discover and join volunteer opportunities easily
Secure payments using Xendit API for a hassle-free donation experience
Mobile-first experience with a smooth and responsive Flutter app
Community engagement through campaign updates and social sharing
challenges_solutions: Secure Payment Processing: Integrated Xendit API to ensure fast, safe, and seamless donation transactions.
User Engagement: Developed a community-driven platform with campaign updates and social sharing features to boost participation.
Volunteer Management: Built a streamlined system for discovering, applying, and managing volunteer opportunities.
my_role: Developed the Peduly mobile app using Flutter, ensuring a smooth and intuitive user experience.
Implemented core features such as fundraising campaign management, donation tracking, and volunteer opportunities.
Integrated secure payment processing with Xendit API for seamless transactions.
Followed best practices to ensure clean, maintainable, and scalable code.

impact_metrics.text: 5,000+ volunteers actively contributing to social causes.
12,000+ fundraising and volunteer initiatives.
Peduly has expanded its volunteer activities to 10+ cities in Indonesia.
Thousands of donations processed daily to support various charitable causes.

future_plans: Introduce a crowdfunding feature to allow individuals to raise funds for personal and community causes.
Expand partnerships with NGOs and corporations to increase social impact.
description:
One of the key features of Peduly is its seamless volunteering system. With just a few taps, users can browse various social initiatives and join movements that align with their passions. From coastal clean-ups to education programs, Peduly bridges the gap between willingness and action.

Take, for example, a recent event where volunteers gathered on a beach to clean up waste. Armed with gloves, determination, and the Peduly spirit, they worked hand-in-hand to restore the beauty of nature. This initiative was just one of many opportunities facilitated by the app, proving that small efforts, when combined, create a massive impact.$!Beyond environmental efforts, Peduly also champions education and empowerment. Peduly volunteers recently gathered at YKI Cabang Koordinasi Jawa Timur for a heartwarming event: "Pizza Creations: A Fun Way to Pass Time Before Iftar with Cancer Survivors." This event brought smiles, warmth, and delicious homemade pizzas to cancer survivors, proving that small acts of kindness can have a big impact.

As volunteers and participants crafted their pizzas together, laughter and joy filled the room. The event wasn’t just about food; it was about creating moments of happiness, fostering connections, and reminding survivors that they are not alone in their journey.$!

title: Pesat
overview: Pesat is a mobile application designed to help employees efficiently monitor parking areas, scan parking tickets, and record visitor data at tourist destinations. With Pesat, staff can easily track available parking spaces, validate tickets using a scanning system, and maintain an organized log of visitor entries. The app enhances operational efficiency, reduces manual errors, and ensures a smooth experience for both employees and visitors.
key_features: User-friendly interface for employees
Quick and accurate parking ticket scanning
Secure and efficient data management
Seamless visitor data recording for improved tracking
challenges_solutions: Performance Optimization: Improved app responsiveness by optimizing database queries and reducing redundant API calls.
User Experience: Designed an intuitive UI to make parking monitoring and visitor registration seamless for employees.
Efficient Ticket Scanning: Implemented barcode/QR code scanning technology for faster and more accurate ticket validation.
my_role: Develop mobile app using Flutter, ensuring a seamless experience for employees.
Implemented a fast and reliable parking ticket scanning system using barcode/QR code technology.
Collaborated with backend engineers to optimize API performance for real-time data updates.
Ensured clean, maintainable, and scalable code by following best practices.

impact_metrics.text: Enabled fast and reliable ticket printing via Bluetooth for seamless operations
Improved parking efficiency and visitor tracking at multiple tourist locations

title: SnapAndCook (Mobile)
overview: SnapAndCook is a smart recipe recommendation app that uses machine learning to scan available ingredients and suggest the best recipes based on what you have. By leveraging advanced image recognition, SnapAndCook helps users minimize food waste, discover new meal ideas, and cook with ease. Whether you're an experienced chef or a beginner, this app transforms your ingredients into delicious meals effortlessly.
key_features: AI-powered ingredient scanning for accurate recognition
Personalized recipe recommendations based on available ingredients
Smart meal planning to reduce food waste
User-friendly interface with step-by-step cooking instructions
challenges_solutions: Ingredient Recognition Accuracy: Improved ML model performance to accurately detect a wide variety of ingredients, even in cluttered environments.
Recipe Recommendation Quality: Enhanced AI algorithm to provide more relevant and diverse recipe suggestions based on ingredient combinations.
App Performance: Optimized image processing and reduced ML inference time to ensure a smooth user experience.
User Experience: Designed a clean and intuitive UI for effortless ingredient scanning and recipe browsing.
my_role: Developed the mobile app using Flutter, ensuring a smooth and intuitive user experience.
Integrated machine learning models for accurate ingredient recognition.
Implemented AI-based recipe recommendation system based on detected ingredients.
Optimized image processing and ML inference to improve app performance.
Maintained clean, scalable, and efficient code following best practices.

impact_metrics.text: Achieved 90% ingredient recognition accuracy using YOLO
Received positive user feedback for intuitive design and AI-powered suggestions
Contributed to food waste reduction by suggesting meals based on available ingredients

title: Sumbangin aja
overview: Sumbangin Aja is a mobile application that connects individuals and businesses with surplus food to those in need, helping to minimize waste and support local communities. The app provides an intuitive platform where users can easily list, donate, and share excess food while ensuring safety and hygiene through built-in guidelines.
key_features: Community-driven platform to reduce food waste
Real-time location-based donations with Google Maps integration
Safety guidelines to ensure food quality and hygiene
Intuitive and user-friendly donation process
challenges_solutions: User Engagement: Simplified the donation process with an intuitive UI/UX, making it easy for users to list and claim food donations.
Food Safety: Integrated safety guidelines and expiration date checks to ensure the quality and hygiene of donated food.
my_role: Integrated Google Maps for real-time location-based donation tracking.
Collaborated with backend engineers to optimize data synchronization and API performance.
Ensured clean, maintainable, and scalable code using best practices in Modern Android Development.

impact_metrics.text: Finalist in KMIPN 3 Hackathon

title: Glory Convention Lints
overview: Glory Convention Lints is a powerful linter library designed to enforce the coding conventions and standards of our company. Built with maintainability, consistency, and best practices in mind, this library ensures that all projects adhere to a unified coding style, improving code quality and collaboration across teams.

Improves code maintainability and readability

Performance Optimization: Optimized linting speed by parallelizing rule checks and reducing unnecessary computations.
my_role: Developed and researched a custom linter to enforce company-wide coding standards.
Designed and implemented custom lint rules tailored to development needs.
Optimized linting performance for faster and more efficient code analysis.
Collaborated with development teams to refine and enhance linting rules.

future_plans: Expand rule coverage to enforce more best practices and security guidelines
